thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Diego P Nascimento
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Diego P Nascimento

author: Diego P Nascimento
title: Diego P Nascimento
text:
Constant updates to increase security and stability and to provide new features. Support always worked, with an average time response of fewer than 24 hours.
I completely recommend this software to anyone wanting to have a really good out of the box coverage of their infrastructure in a software that is really easy to maintain and understand.
